price: Nao wako juu ya viti vya enzi wakiangalia.
footnotes: Ilhali wako juu ya vitanda na matakia watakuwa Waumini wakiziangalia neema za Mwenyezi Mungu alizo wapa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
